General.Name: Can B Corp
General.Description: Can B Corp., a health and wellness company, develops, manufactures, and sells hemp derived products in the United States. The company provides CBD products derived from hemp, including oils, creams, moisturizers, isolate, gel caps, spa products, concentrates, and lifestyle products. It sells its products under the Canbiola, Nu Wellness, Seven Chakras, and Pure Leaf Oil brands through medical professionals, website, and vending machines. The company also produces industrial hemp, and processes hemp biomass, isolate, and isomers, such as CBN, CBG, delta-8, and delta-10; and manufactures and sells durable medical equipment. The company was formerly known as Canbiola Inc. and changed its name to Can B Corp. in February 2020. Can B Corp. was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Hicksville, New York.
General.Address: 960 South Broadway, Hicksville, NY, United States, 11801
